title: Stop Complaining about Yasuo
body: They're nerfing him alright, so give it up

replies.body: i will give it up when at least 1 in 5 normal games doesn't feature yasuo. not 1 in 30

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zIikdt2V,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-08T06:23:11.012+0000)
>
> i will give it up when at least 1 in 5 normal games doesn't feature yasuo. not 1 in 30

I don't see yasuo's at all. Oh wait. Because i don't play.
???? im a bit confuzzled, why do you care then ?

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zIikdt2V,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-08-08T06:27:14.053+0000)
>
> ???? im a bit confuzzled, why do you care then ?

its relative to the forum activity?

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zIikdt2V,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-08-08T06:27:14.053+0000)
>
> ???? im a bit confuzzled, why do you care then ?

because I hate people complaining about yasuo when he is perfectly fine.

Same with most the other people you people complain about, its not my fault you can't think with more than .001% of your brain, not my fault you are all stupid, so stop complaining about it.
You make these posts what seems like once a week lmao.

> [{quoted}](name=ForwardSkies,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zIikdt2V,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-08T06:19:24.338+0000)
>
> You make these posts what seems like once a week lmao.

so. give. it. up.
Implying I'm making them lmao. I don't have an issue fighting him, but obviously, he's a toxic champion if so many people make posts about him and you feel the need to make these. Get over it.

I feel yasou is only a problem in normals due to a mix of lack of counterpicking or banning and because people can't play around him because 1. it's hard to play around a guy with infinite dashes especially as a skillshot reliant mage 2. almost every yasou you see in normals has at least 200k points mastery and only plays yasou.
I'm not saying he's really broken (though I am a fan of scaling his windwall back from 3.75s to 3s duration) and if I counterpick him he's generally pretty easy to beat even the 200k mains with something really simple and easy to play like cho'gath, riven, darius, rammus, leblanc, zed, spaceaids, vlad or fizz or just cross my fingers I have a good assassin jungler like rengar or shaco and they gank alot.

I would really like normals with a draft, maybe on the weekends like the easiest optional gamemode to establish, make it like ranked but without the pressure of gaining/losing Lp. Also great way to prepare for your placements.
To be fair i can't remember the last time i saw a yasuo. I've never much had a problem with him showing up every game or most games for a good 3 months or so now.
